CommandDefinition.Name: migrateruntimecontext
CommandDefinition.Description: Migrates RuntimeContext 'from' to 'to': Each RuntimeContext requiring 'from' will require 'to' afterwards. Runtime-Objects (Orders, Cronlike Orders, etc) will be tried to migrate. Condition for successful migration of Runtime Objects: All used objects (XMOM, classes, etc) must be compatibly resolvable in the same Runtime Context as before, except substituting 'from' with 'to'.

Argument.Name: fromApplicationName
Argument.Description: The name of the owner application.

Argument.Name: fromVersionName
Argument.Description: The name of the owner application version.

Argument.Name: fromWorkspaceName
Argument.Description: The name of the owner workspace.

Argument.Name: toApplicationName
Argument.Description: The name of the required application.

Argument.Name: toVersionName
Argument.Description: The name of the required application version.

Argument.Name: toWorkspaceName
Argument.Description: The name of the required workspace.
